text:
Our long-term calendar is in Sheets, because we need to consider a lot of variables as we prioritize: SEO potential, availability of subject matter experts, availability of our writers, are we able to outsource this piece or not, etc.

And then, when most of these questions are answered and as the tasks approach our weekly workload (when we're planning to start them in the next 3-4 weeks) I move them to ClickUp.
